title: Music in the school
creator_credit: Margaretha Rosencrantz, Svensk Filmindustri and Royal Swedish Board of Education
brief_description: The teaching of music in Swedish schools. The place of music in the curriculum and as one of the outside interests provided for by the schools. The methods used in teaching singing, instrumental work, music appreciation, theory and history at all levels are shown in some detail. The soundtrack is in English except for children singing.
